name: Azure AD group creation for Github
comments: Azure AD group 'github-access' created.
Appropriate permissions and policies applied to 'github-access'.
Azure AD integration with GitHub established.
Security audit logs reviewed; no anomalies detected.
User training session scheduled to guide the use of 'github-access'.

name: AWS EC2 deploy
comments: AMI selected based on project requirements.
EC2 instance launched in the correct region and availability zone.
Security group configured; inbound traffic limited to necessary ports.
Deployed application verified and functional.
Monitoring and logging set up for the EC2 instance.

name: Jenkins pipeline setup
comments: Jenkins server provisioned and secured.
Build pipeline created, including build, test, and deployment stages.
Credentials for code repository and deployment targets stored securely.
Webhooks configured for automated pipeline triggering.
Initial build and deployment successfully executed.

name: Database setup
comments: Database engine selected (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.).
Database instance created and configured with appropriate resources.
Schema designed and implemented.
User accounts and permissions set up within the database.
Database backup strategy established.

name: Create new VPC with IP ranges
comments: VPC created with desired CIDR block.
Subnets defined for different tiers (public, private, database).
Internet Gateway attached (if applicable).
Routing tables configured for proper network flow.
Network ACLs and Security Groups set up to enforce security rules.

name: Terraform infrastructure provisioning
comments: Terraform configuration files created for desired resources.
State tracking set up (local or remote backend).
Terraform plan reviewed for accuracy.
Terraform applied to create infrastructure.
Verification testing of provisioned resources.

name: Kubernetes cluster deployment
comments: Master nodes provisioned and configured.
Worker nodes added to the cluster.
Networking (pods, services) set up correctly.
Helm installed for package management.
Initial application deployment tested.

name: DNS record update for new service
comments: Identified the authoritative DNS server for the domain.
Appropriate DNS record(s) created (A, CNAME, etc.).
Propagation time considered.
Records verified using lookup tools.
Documentation updated with new DNS information.

name: Troubleshooting network latency issue
comments: Problem scope defined (affected users, applications, etc.).
Network path traced (traceroute, MTR).
Potential bottlenecks identified (routers, firewalls).
Configuration changes or optimizations implemented.
Monitoring set up to ensure issue is resolved.

name: Data migration to new storage platform
comments: Backup of existing data taken.
New storage platform provisioned and configured.
Data transfer method selected (sync tools, scripting).
Data integrity verified post-migration.
Old storage system decommissioned safely.
